titles.title: I'm Not Ashamed to Own the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I'm not ashamed to own my Lord, or to defend his cause, maintain the honor of his Word, the glory of his cross.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus, my God! I know his name, his name is all my trust; nor will he put my soul to shame, nor let my hope be lost.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Firm as his throne his promise stands, and he can well secure what I've committed to his hands 'til the decisive hour.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Then will he own my worthless name before his Father's face, and in the new Jerusalem appoint my soul a place.
